ARABIC: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Ward off evil with what is better. We know very well what they express.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Dispel evil with what is good. We know well what they attribute (to Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad)! Repel evil in the best manner. We are well aware of all that they say about you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Respond to the injustice (done to you) with the better deed. We know best what they attribute to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Repel evil with the best deeds; We well know the matters that they fabricate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Repel evil with that which is better. We are best-acquainted with the things they utter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Repel evil by what is best; We know best what they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Repel thou the evil with that which is fairer. We Ourselves know very well that they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Repel evil with that which is better. We are Best Aware of that which they allege.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Repel evil with what is best, We are well aware of the things they say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Repel thou the evil with that which is the best, We are the Best Knower of that which they utter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Repel ill [conduct] with that which is the best. We know best whatever they allege.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Repel evil with that which is best: We are well acquainted with the things they say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Repel evil with that which is better. We are Best-Acquainted with the things they utter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Repel evil with that which is better. We know that which they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Repel evil by what is better. We are aware of what they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:96] Ward off with that which is better, that is to say, with the [better] trait of pardoning and shunning them, the evil [act], the hurt they cause you — this was [revealed] before the command to fight [them]. We know best what they allege, [what] they invent of lies and [what they] say and so We will requite them for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Repel evil with that which is better) repel by means of "there is no god except Allah" the expression of idolatry which is coming from Abu Jahl and his host; and it is also said that this means: repel from yourself their indecent talk through the greeting of peace. (We are best Aware of that which they allege) of lies.
